Control Name: 1.5.8 Cost-effective regions are considered as part of the deployment selection.
Control Statement: Is there a technical/legal reason for deploying in a particular region? If not, it might be worth looking at another region to decrease cost. Also depending on the workload and data processing model, choosing a cheaper region might make more financial sense.
